citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1300 on
12-Dec-19.Upon arrival, I called the phone number listed, knocked on the door and waited 40 min. Please call me
with your current hours of operation.
This is the first attempted inspection.
Additional Inspectors
Padden Andrew, Veterinary Medical Officer
